This is a PHP port of the htmldiff.py library by Aaron Swartz <me@aaronsw.com>.

Written by Antti Hukkanen <antti.hukkanen@mainiotech.fi>.

The sequence matcher is included from the BSD-licensed php-diff library 
by Chris Boulton <chris.boulton@interspire.com>.

You can find the php-diff project from here:
https://github.com/chrisboulton/php-diff
